Literature.Title: Synthetic molecular evolution of host cell-compatible, antimicrobial peptides effective against drug-resistant, biofilm-forming bacteria.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2020;117:8437-8448
Literature.Author: Starr CG, Ghimire J, Guha S, Hoffmann JP, Wang Y, Landreneau BN, Sun L, Sammarco MC, Morici LA, Wimley WC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=5.2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>30µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=26µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>30µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=6.6µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=18.7µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>30µM)
